meanings.definition: A sore on the skin or mucous membrane
meanings.sent1: The doctor treated the ulcer on my leg with medication.
meanings.sent2: She had a small ulcer on her lip that healed quickly.
meanings.sent3: The little ulcer on the banana peel made it look like a sad face.
meanings.sent4: The ulcer of corruption spread through the organization like a wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The ulcer on the tree bark oozed sap, creating a sticky mess.

meanings.definition: A source of corruption or evil
meanings.sent1: The criminal was the ulcer in the peaceful community.
meanings.sent2: Greed can be the ulcer that destroys relationships.
meanings.sent3: The gossiping neighbor was like an ulcer, spreading rumors everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The dark secret was an ulcer eating away at his conscience.
meanings.sent5: The corrupt politician was the ulcer in the government, causing chaos.
